item.description:
This event is through ASMP- you need to pay them and sign up with them please!!

ASMP New England Presents

Tuesday, March 18th, 2008

Peter Vanderwarker:

Getting Good Light, Getting Good Clients

Probably the pre-eminent architectural photographer in the region, Peter
Vanderwarker has authored several books, received numerous grants and has been collected by major corporations and museums.
His assignment work has taken him all over the US plus to Europe, Bhutan and Taiwan.
He has shot for the Boston Red Sox, Architectural Digest Magazine, the Fogg
Art Museum as well as many other clients.
Peter will share his war stories: How he gets work, how he treats clients, and how he manages his time.

Join us for an evening of inspiring images and insights by a master of our craft !

Location: Exposure Place @ EP Levine's ,23 Drydock Ave. Boston
Time: Social hour and food: 6:00pm; Program: 7:00pm
Cost: Members-Free
Students-Assistants: $5
Non Members: $20
For details and directions, go to: www.asmpnewengland.
item.why: Peter will share his war stories: How he gets work, how he treats clients, and how he manages his time.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: ASMP New England Presents Peter Vanderwarker: Getting Good Light, Getting Good C
